sentences.en: Suddenly, he found a lizard window to his desk, he saw the iguana extremely happy.
sentences.cn: 突然, 他发现一只蜥蜴从窗户外跳到他的书桌上, 他看到那只蜥蜴高兴极了.

sentences.en: The green iguana’s extensive range comprises the rain forests of northern Mexico, Central America, the Caribbean Islands, and southern Brazil.
sentences.cn: 绿鬣蜥分布广泛，活动范围包括墨西哥北部、中美洲、加勒比岛和巴西南部的雨林。

sentences.en: This iguana is one of the few lizards found in that cold climate.
sentences.cn: 这种鬣蜥是在寒冷的气候条件下发现的少数蜥蜴当中的一种。

sentences.en: With an iguana, you really don't have to say surprise.
sentences.cn: 惊喜两字已经不足以形容这只鬣鳞蜥了.

trans.tran_cn: 鬣鳞蜥（产于中美洲和南美洲）
